title: "CES 2024: eYs3D's New Edge AI Chips Transforming Computer Vision for Robotics"
excerpt: "Set to launch its eCV series SoCs later in 2024, eYs3D is embracing its concept of \"AI+\" and expanding its offering from USB-based controllers to full-fledged, edge-based SoCs. Built around on-core CPUs with ARM-based Cortex M and Cortex A architectures, the series provides top efficiency and next-level processing power."
